translation: Hello, everyone.
transcript: 大家好。

translation: My name is Wu Zhengdan, the creator of the “ballet on the shoulder”.
transcript: 我是肩上芭蕾的创始人吴正丹。

translation: From 6 to 16, I am an athlete.
transcript: 呃因为我从6岁开始到我16岁，我是一名运动员。

translation: This period should have been the happiest moment in my childhood.
transcript: 6岁到16岁，是我人生当中童年最快乐的一个阶段。

translation: But that’s for other children, not for me.
transcript: 但是这是对所有孩子们来说，但对于我来说不是这样。

translation: When I was 6 years old, I only did the most basic thing, which is enduring pains every day.
transcript: 我的6岁，只做了一件最基础的事情，就是每天在疼痛当中。

translation: However, this has laid a great foundation for me.
transcript: 但是这些都是为我打下了一个非常好的基础。

translation: I have a very good physical state and quality, as well as an excellent elasticity.
transcript: 我有很好的身体状态，我有很好的能力素质，还有很好的柔韧性。

translation: These qualities are essential for me becoming a dancer like myself today.
transcript: 只有把这些做好，我才能够呈现成今天的这个样子。

translation: For some reasons, I was eliminated and sent the team of acrobatic gymnastics, which is still a sport.
transcript: 后来因为各种原因，被淘汰了，我被队伍给送到了技巧队，技巧仍然是一个运动项目。

translation: When I was 6, I met my partner.
transcript: 从我六岁的时候，我认识了我的搭档。

translation: At that time, we didn't know that we would be a pair and now he is my husband.
transcript: 当然那个时候我们并不知道，我们未来是搭档，他也是我的先生。

translation: By coincidence, we were arranged by the coach to become partners, for the mixed pair program in acrobatic gymnastics.
transcript: 嗯，后来很巧合，我们两个人被老师组合在一起，成为了两个技巧混合双人的项目的配合的合作者。

translation: I was so afraid that he might bully me or even beat me.
transcript: 我我非常怕他欺负我，啊甚至是动手打我。

translation: When I first met him, I told him that I would not practice with him unless he agreed to three rules: first, he was not allowed to beat me; second, he was not allowed to shout at me; third, he was not allowed to drop me.
transcript: 但是我及见到他之后，第一次我就跟他说，我说让我和你练可以，但是你必须答应我三个条件：第一不许打我，第二不许骂我，第三不许摔我。

translation: Why did I mention being dropped?
transcript: 为什么说不能摔我？

translation: Because some acrobatic movements are performed high above the ground.
transcript: 因为这个项目是有高空的。

translation: I will be lifted up into the air.
transcript: 是举起来的。

translation: If the base performer is not happy, the one on the top may be dropped.
transcript: 如果下面人不高兴的话，摔一下上面也是有可能的。

translation: He accepted my conditions and kept his promise.
transcript: 他也答应了我的这个要求，而且也遵守了他的承诺。

translation: We worked together as a mixed pair since 1992.
transcript: 那么我们这样子配合从1992年开始一直到现在他都是我的搭档。

translation: He is still my partner, and also my life partner.
transcript: 也是我的终身伴侣。

translation: During a competition in 1996, when I performed somersault on his shoulder, I slipped, fell and hit my head on the floor.
transcript: 96年的一次比赛当中，我从他的肩膀上空翻落地，结果我踩滑了，一下子头戳到地上。

translation: I nearly repeated Sang Lan’s accident.
transcript: 我差一点就变成了桑兰。

translation: Nevertheless, the accident became a turning point.
transcript: 但是也因为这一次的事故。

translation: It was my great honor that our performance impressed leaders of Soldier Acrobatic Troupe of the Political Department of Guangzhou Military Region.
transcript: 我非常有幸地被广州军区战士杂技团的领导看上了。

translation: They invited us to Guangzhou where I started a new career.
transcript: 那他们邀请我们来到了广州，在广州我开始了新的一条道路。

translation: I had never thought of becoming an acrobat.
transcript: 我自己从来没有想过我会成为一名杂技演员。

translation: When I came to the Soldier Acrobatic Troupe, I didn’t have a clue about my future.
transcript: 所以当来到战士杂技团的时候，我根本不知道我的方向在哪里。

translation: During the troupe's global tour, we performed only the acrobatic mixed pair program.
transcript: 因为我在国外演出的时候，那个时候我们只是双人的一个技巧项目。

translation: With a slight recasting of a previous work, it was showed to the foreign audience.
transcript: 一个重新编排，然后在国外演出。

translation: A very famous ballet master, who was also the Artistic Director of the Royal Danish Ballet, watched our performance.
transcript: 有一位非常著名的芭蕾舞大师也是丹麦皇家芭蕾舞团的团长，他看完我们这个作品以后。

translation: He commended that, “These two performers were so beautiful that they danced like the prince and princess of ballet.”
transcript: 他说：“这两个演员太漂亮了，他们就像两个芭蕾的王子和公主一样。”

translation: His comments inspired me.
transcript: 就因为他这一句话。

translation: I began to wonder if I could wear a pair of pointe shoes.
transcript: 但是我想我可不可以试着穿一双足尖鞋。

translation: So, I wore the shoes and started the first step -- standing on the floor and rising up on my toes.
transcript: 那么就这样我穿上了这双足尖鞋，开始了我的第一步，站在地上把脚尖立起来。

translation: However, standing on the tips of my toes was barely enough.
transcript: 但是我仅仅在地上立起来，我无论如何。

translation: By no means could I dance as well as professional ballerinas.
transcript: 我是跳不过专业的芭蕾舞演员。

translation: After all, they started the ballet training when they were 10.
transcript: 因为他们从10岁开始。

translation: At that time, I was already 20 years old.
transcript: 这个时候我已经快20岁了。

translation: When we composed “ballet on the shoulder”, I did not know where I could stand.
transcript: 那么肩上芭蕾，从开始创作这个节目，并不是说刚开始就知道站在这个位置。

translation: I found the best spot gradually, by stepping on the body of my partner, my husband.
transcript: 而是一步一步，我在我爱人，在我搭档的身上。

translation: I left my footprints on almost every inch of his skin.
transcript: 每一寸肌肤都有我的脚印。

translation: He just laid on the ground and let me step anywhere I wanted.
transcript: 因为他躺在地上任我踩。

translation: It was a painful journey.
transcript: 当然很痛苦，这个过程是很艰难的。

translation: We wanted to combine acrobatics with ballet, but how?
transcript: 我们那个时候想跟人结合，怎么结合？

translation: The only choice is through the body, by standing on his body.
transcript: 只有往人的身上去结合，站在他身上。

translation: But we had no idea where I could stand.
transcript: 但是身上哪一个位置能站，这些都是我们没有想过的。

translation: We had to try, finding the largest area of his body.
transcript: 我们只能去试，找身上面积最大的地方。

translation: Our first option was the back of my partner.
transcript: 然后我们第一个位置是站在人的后背上。

translation: But that didn't seem exquisite enough, so how did we do?
transcript: 后面觉得后背啧不够难怎么办？

translation: I decided to stand on the shoulder.
transcript: 往肩膀上站。

translation: But on which part of the shoulder?
transcript: 但是肩膀上站在哪里？

translation: Standing here, or there?
transcript: 站在这儿还是站在这儿？

translation: After thousands of experiments, we believed only this part of muscle was large enough to stand without touching his bone.
transcript: 最后我们经过千百次的尝试，觉得只有这一块儿肌肉，既不能碰到骨头又能够这个位置的面积又是最大的。

translation: So, we finally decided to try this part of shoulder.
transcript: 所以我们最后试在这个地方。

translation: But this place, as you can see from the picture, was so difficult to stand that I would surely fall off if missing only one millimeter.
transcript: 但是在这个位置，其实大家看到的这个图片，前后只差一毫米我就会掉下来。

translation: Every day, I failed and tried again.
transcript: 我每天都在失败当中进行着。

translation: Why do I show this picture?
transcript: 为什么有一张放一张这样的图片？

translation: This is the shoulder of my husband.
transcript: 这个是我爱人肩爱人的肩膀。

translation: Every day it was seriously bruised, because I had to spin and turn around repeatedly with toes on his shoulder, constantly producing frictions.
transcript: 每一天都是血肉模糊的，因为我的这只两只脚在他的身上，每一天要重复性地转体、转身，不断地在这里摩擦。

translation: The top of my pointe shoes was covered with blood and pus.
transcript: 我的足尖鞋，鞋头上面全都是血和脓。

translation: In Guangdong where the weather was remarkably hot, the day after I finished practicing, a thin layer of scab formed on my husband’s shoulder.
transcript: 在广州这样炎热的天气，每天练完了，第二天上面结的小小薄薄的一层，结的一层痂。

translation: But the scab would be soon screwed off by my first ballet movement on the second day.
transcript: 第二天被我第一个动作就会给拧下来。

translation: But we kept working on it day after day for hundreds, if not thousands, of times.
transcript: 但是我们每天就这样，应该是不少于一百次，成百上千次。

translation: Why was that?
transcript: 为什么？

translation: The physical pain was no big deal for me.
transcript: 其实这种皮肉之苦，我觉得都不算什么。

translation: Because physical injuries were common among actors and athletes. We were able to bear the pain.
transcript: 因为这皮肉之苦，大家做演员，做运动员我们都能承受。

translation: Even if I broke my feet, I could perform immediately after the nerve block injection.
transcript: 哪怕脚断了我我打上封闭我都能冲上去。

translation: What we feared most was the feeling of loss and confusion.
transcript: 但是最可怕的是迷茫、困惑。

translation: Why?
transcript: 为什么？

translation: Because we did not have any directions.
transcript: 因为我们没有方向。

translation: No coach could tell me whether I was doing good or wrong.
transcript: 没有一个老师能告诉我，这样做对或者是不对。

translation: I didn't know the skills nor technical requirements.
transcript: 我没有动作要领，我没有技术要求。

translation: I didn’t have any ready solution to the problems.
transcript: 我不知道应该怎么样才能够克服这些问题。

translation: I did not know what made my movement good or what was wrong with my bad movement.
transcript: 因为今天做好的不知道怎么好的，明天做不好，也不知道因为什么没做好。

translation: Every day we were immersed in confusion.
transcript: 所以每天在这种迷茫当中。

translation: Although we were already in a relationship, we almost broke up for this work.
transcript: 我们两个人那个时候已经相爱了，但是我们俩差点因为这个作品就分开了。

translation: Every day, we argued, disagreed, quarreled and complained to each other.
transcript: 因为我们每天都在斗争，都在矛盾，都在争吵，彼此埋怨抱怨当中。

translation: Success was something we all desired, but we did not know where to head for.
transcript: 我们都希望成功，但是我们找不到方向。

translation: We were not sure of how the work was going to be like.
transcript: 而且也很迷茫的是这个作品出来以后会是一个什么样的结果。

translation: During our preparation, everyone would confronted us with, “Are you going to disgrace ballet? Are you going to subvert ballet?”
transcript: 因为在练的过程当中，所有人都在说，你们准备践踏芭蕾吗？你们准备颠覆芭蕾吗？

translation: We really didn’t know what would happen.
transcript: 就是我们不知道，我们出来的结果会是怎么样。

translation: That was the scariest thing during that period.
transcript: 真的很啧那种感觉真的是我觉得是最恐惧的，在那个阶段。

translation: Now, I feel so lucky that we stick to it.
transcript: 那么，我觉得很幸运的是我们坚持下来了。

translation: No matter what difficulties we met, the one that paused the work or the one made me nearly quit, we persevered and finally made it.
transcript: 我们中间不管遇到了什么困难，也有停止的时候，也有想放弃的时候，但最终我们还是坚持下来了。

translation: Later, we also tried ballet on the head.
transcript: 后面我们还练了站在头上。

translation: We toured in many countries for performance.
transcript: 因为我们后面到了很多国家去演出。

translation: I had imagined the success, but I never thought of such a huge recognition and acknowledgement.
transcript: 我幻想它会成功，但是我真的没有想过，它会得到这么大的一个认可和肯定。

translation: As a Chinese performer, with the current context, my performance has attracted people from different places around the world, I felt very proud as a Chinese performer.
transcript: 我作为一个中国演员，我觉得在这样的一个环境当中，啧嗯，能够得到全世界，因为在这里面是真的是世界各国的人们都会来到这里来欣赏，我觉得很骄傲很自豪，作为一个中国的演员。

translation: I created the choreography in 1998 and won the prize in 2002.
transcript: 我从做这个节目的时候，1998年下半年开始到我2002年获得这个奖项。

translation: During the four years in Guangzhou, we had no friends.
transcript: 四年的时间，我在广州可以说一个朋友没有。

translation: I came here with my husband, from Liaoning Province, the northeastern part of China, and we practiced for 10 hours a day in the rehearsal room.
transcript: 我跟我爱人两个人，从东北辽宁来到这里，嗯，真的是每天十个小时都在排练场里度过。

translation: In retrospect, I think it was a very hard time, but I am very proud for my perseverance.
transcript: 现在回忆起来都觉得啧真的挺不容易的，但是我也很很为自己骄傲，就是我坚持下来了。

translation: I am very very lucky, because not everyone attains success with hard work, but I won the recognition.
transcript: 而且老天爷对我非常非常好，因为不是所有人付出努力都能够有所收获的，但是我我却得到了认可。

translation: Besides, I have done something that I am good at.
transcript: 而且我做了一件非常擅长的一件事儿。

translation: I have all the favorable conditions to show my talents, my values and advantages.
transcript: 而且真的是充分的体现我的条件，我的价值和我的优势。

translation: I have great passion for my job.
transcript: 现在我把它已经当成了我的一个生活兴趣。

translation: It has become a hobby of mine and I enjoy it.
transcript: 一个爱好，我很享受。

translation: I am nearly 40 years old, but I am still on the stage.
transcript: 虽然现在已经快40岁了，但是我仍然还在舞台上。

translation: Sometimes, I feel a little bit tired, but this kind of tiredness is bittersweet to me.
transcript: 嗯，虽然嗯啧就是有的时候会觉得很有点累，但是这种累，我觉得是痛并快乐着那种，享受。

translation: I enjoy the work I am doing.
transcript: 我享受工作带给我的这种乐趣，哈。

translation: Thank you!
transcript: 谢谢你们！

translation: This is the feedback from some of our audience during our performance.
transcript: 嗯，那么接下来再讲的就是这些都是我们演出当中嗯一些观众的反馈。

translation: We participated in 30 consecutive performances at the Shanghai Grand Theatre.
transcript: 我们在上海大剧院演出，连续演出30场。

translation: Few programs in China could achieve this -- we received standing ovations for every performance.
transcript: 在中国很少有剧目可以做到这一点，能够每一场观众都是起立鼓掌。

translation: I will tell you the truth.
transcript: 真的，我真的觉得很。

translation: Every time before I entered the stage or standing on the stage, I was so tired and overwhelmed by the non-stop work, that I hoped the stage lights could go out.
transcript: 每一次我演出前我都说，我站在舞台上的时候，因为很累，连续演几十场的时候真的很累，有的时候我希望舞台的灯光能不能停掉。

translation: I hoped that the stage was out of light for a whole day or some accident occurred, so that I could stop performing.
transcript: 能不能今天就停电了或者是有什么意外的事情，这场演出可以不用演了。

translation: I had such illusion.
transcript: 就有这样的幻想。

translation: But when I stood on the stage and started to perform.
transcript: 但是真的到了舞台上开始表演的时候。

translation: I was still dedicated until the last minute.
transcript: 是依然是那么投入，而且到我演完最后一个节目。

translation: After the 1.5 hours show, when I took a bow to the applauding audience, I thought it was all worthwhile.
transcript: 一小时五十分钟结束的时候，我上场给观众鞠躬谢幕的时候，观众起立为我鼓掌那一瞬间我就觉得一切都值了。

translation: I really enjoyed the moment when I was met by standing ovations.
transcript: 我觉得太享受那一刻了。

translation: At the moment, all the tiredness disappeared in an instance.
transcript: 就是前面的那种累和那些东西就烟消云散全部忘掉了。

translation: That was the happiest time of my life as a performer.
transcript: 所以我觉得这就是作为一个演员，最啧最幸福的那一瞬间。

translation: Up until now, I am still passionate about the stage and the peak of my career lasted until 2008.
transcript: 所以到现在为止，我仍然迷恋舞台，我最高峰的时候，大概持续到2008年。

translation: I fell from the peak of my career because of an accident, my pregnancy.
transcript: 那么这一次呃应该说，从巅峰坠落是一次意外，我怀孕了。

translation: It should be a good thing.
transcript: 应该是一件好事情。

translation: But for a performer, especially when I was at the peak of my dancing career, I was not prepared to be a mom.
transcript: 但是对于我们来说，我正在舞台上，我在最顶峰的时候，我没有做好充分的思想准备，我有了孩子。

translation: After giving birth, my body was out of shape.
transcript: 那么当我生完宝宝以后，我的身材变形了。

translation: All my trainings in past were in vain.
transcript: 我的武功全废了。

translation: I was not able to stand on the stage as perfectly as before.
transcript: 我再也不能像以前一样站在舞台上。

translation: Getting back in shape was hard for me. I still remembered the hardships as if they happened yesterday.
transcript: 那么这个恢复的过程，对我来说记忆犹新，非常痛苦，历历在目。

translation: Even though it was 37 Celsius Degree in Guangzhou, wrapped in plastic wrap and putting on clothes for weight loss, I spent one hour on running every afternoon.
transcript: 因为广州37度的天，我穿着减肥衣里面包着保鲜膜，每天在广在广州一个小时下午去跑步。

translation: I ate food on a scale.
transcript: 然后我每天站在秤上吃东西。

translation: No matter how many dishes were on the table, I only had five bites of food and walked away.
transcript: 然后我我每一顿饭无论桌上有多少个菜，我只吃五口，吃完我就走。

translation: Because only in this way could I lose weight rapidly.
transcript: 因为我只有这样，我才能快速地把体重减下来。

translation: My love for the job, at that time, turned into obsession.
transcript: 我觉得我对我自己工作的这种热爱，就是说那个时候，已经到了一种嗯啧就是痴迷的一种状态。

translation: Why was I so eager to recover my body shape?
transcript: 然后因为我为什么要这么急迫的恢复？

translation: Because I found myself falling in to a state of depression.
transcript: 我发现我抑郁了。

translation: Because I truly felt that in the past 20 years, I only did one thing, that was performing on the stage.
transcript: 因为真的感觉到自己，除了这么多年前20多年所做的事情，就干了一件事儿，就是在舞台上。

translation: I found that I was not good at any other things.
transcript: 我发现我其他事情都不行。

translation: Only by performing could I show my value.
transcript: 我只有在舞台上能够体现我自己的价值。

translation: Therefore, I really hoped to get back on the stage as soon as possible.
transcript: 所以我非常希望，我快一点能够回到舞台上。

translation: My waist, my entire lumbar spine, was not as flexible as before.
transcript: 我的我的我的腰，整个腰椎我再也不能像以前那么柔软了。

translation: But there is a benefit of taking a long break.
transcript: 但是有一点我很庆幸的是离开舞台这么长时间。

translation: I found that sometimes in life, you will become better, but not necessarily onstage.
transcript: 我发现人生有的时候，未必是一直在舞台上，你就会越来越好。

translation: The one year’s break gave me another reward.
transcript: 停下来这一年，我觉得我有了不同的收获。

translation: My life and stage experience were refreshed.
transcript: 我的人生，我的舞台经验。

translation: I had different feelings.
transcript: 我的感受不同了。

translation: When I expressed myself through dance, the emotions, ideas and the message I conveyed to the audience were totally different.
transcript: 我在给观众表达的时候，我觉得我的情感上，我的思想上，传递的是另外一种信息。

translation: People told me, “Zhengdan, you have elevated to a new level. You have made progress again.”
transcript: 所有的人都说正丹，你又升华了，你又进步了。

translation: So, I think a person at different periods in his life will gain different things and go through different feelings.
transcript: 所以我觉得就是一个人到了一个年龄段不同的阶段，收获是不同的，感受不同的。

translation: I find that skills could improve naturally after a certain age, but you have to wait until it comes.
transcript: 因为后来我觉得有很多不练自涨的这种这种功力，我觉得真的到了一定年龄以后才能感受到。

translation: This is my experience.
transcript: 呃这是我的一个一个感受。

translation: Then I got back to the stage and won the Galina Ulanova Prize in Russia.
transcript: 那么后来我又重新回到舞台上，并且获得了这个在俄罗斯拿了这个乌兰诺娃奖。

translation: This reward is very precious to every dancer.
transcript: 这个奖项对于所有的舞蹈演员来说都是一件非常难得的一件事儿。

translation: I am an acrobatic performer or more precisely, a crossover ballet dancer.
transcript: 那我作为一个杂技演员，应该算是一个跨界的演员我能够呃得到这个殊荣。

translation: I am very proud that I can receive the honor and I really cherish it.
transcript: 我很我很骄傲，同时我也很珍惜。

translation: Now I am not only a performer, but also a keeper and a torch-passer of the art.
transcript: 那么现在我已经不仅仅是一个演员，我更多的是一个传承者、传灯者。

translation: My responsibility and obligation are to pass “ballet on the shoulder”, the miracle and technique created by the Chinese, to the next generation, so that the art is kept alive.
transcript: 因为我的责任和义务，就是要将肩上芭蕾，中国人创造的这样的一个奇迹，一个技术，传承下去，发展下去。

translation: Besides, I have trained many little friends.
transcript: 那么另外，我也培养了很多小朋友。

translation: I hope their dream could come true and I am ready to give a hand.
transcript: 我希望这些孩子们，能够实现他们的梦想，我能够帮助到他们。

translation: I also believe, dance learners are the most dedicated and hardworking people.
transcript: 同时我也相信学舞蹈的孩子，他们一定是最坚强，最能够吃苦。

translation: They will succeed in everything they do.
transcript: 那我相信，他们将来做任何事情都一定会成功。

translation: To summarize, the perfection that we will never reach but never give up pursuing is the charm of ballet.
transcript: 嗯，应该这样说吧，就是永远无法达到的极致的完美，但始终不懈追求完美的那每一刻，就是芭蕾的魔力。

translation: “Ballet on the shoulder” occupies the first half of my life and I am grateful for this amazing encounter.
transcript: 嗯，我想说我的前半生，非常感谢与肩上芭蕾的邂逅。

translation: Standing on the stage, on the shoulder of my husband, makes me feel very proud.
transcript: 嗯，现在站在舞台上，站在我老公的肩膀上，我感觉非常的骄傲。

translation: At that moment, I feel very powerful and all-conquering.
transcript: 我觉得那一刻，我天下无敌。

translation: Thank you!
transcript: 谢谢大家！
